meta.name: description
meta.content: Mead School District 354 is a public K-12 school district located north of Spokane, Washington. Over 10,000 students attend our 14 schools. MSD354 has been serving north Spokane for over 100 years.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Mead School District 354, Mead School District, Mead Schools, Mead School District

article.div: Following Governor Inslee's April 6 order designed to aggressively slow the spread of COVID-19, all Mead School District school buildings are closed for students for the remainder of the 2019/20 school year. Read more . . .

To date we have sponsored five Chromebook distribution events where 3,000+ devices have been checked out. For families still needing access to a device (limit two per family) we are registering students for our next deployment. Read more . . .

Beginning Monday, March 23, children, age 18 and under, can enjoy a FREE, nutritious, "grab-and-go" breakfast and lunch while our schools are closed. Registration is not required and children do not need to be Mead students to participate. Children and/or parents can pick up sack meals, which include lunch and breakfast for the following day. Read more . . .

h1.a: Social Emotional Learning Menus for K-3 & 4-5

img.alt: Social and Emotional Learning Calendar Menus for Grades K-3 & 4-5.

article.div: Feel free to use these calendars of ideas to promote continued social emotional learning. Read more . . .
For families wishing to supplement learning at home during the Emergency School Closure our Learning Services Department has put together additional learning resources. Read more . . .

If you or someone you know has had a change in living circumstances due to a layoff because of the COVID-19 "Stay Home, Stay Healthy" order, please know there are resources available to help. Read more . . .

Need help with basic resources (food, housing, domestic violence, clothing, etc.) or wonder where to turn for help with a mental health or substance abuse problem? Our Crisis Team has put together a list of helpful resources. Read more . . .
